summary: ToneAI - Decentralized Music Creation on the Ethereum Blockchain - ToneAI is a revolutionary decentralized application built on the Ethereum blockchain that utilizes artificial intelligence (AI) to convert text into unique musical compositions. This whitepaper provides an in-depth exploration of ToneAI's architecture, functionality, and its innovative approach to enabling users to create, share, and monetize music in a decentralized manner. The system ensures fair compensation to creators through a royalty distribution mechanism, with additional privileges for premium users.
